Author: Allison
Title: GitHub Enterprise license history tracking now available in public preview
EnhancedContent:
GitHub Enterprise admins can now view a history of license usage over time. This feature provides a daily snapshot of license additions and removals for GitHub Enterprise Cloud, helping admins and billing managers understand how licenses are being consumed.

### What’s included

- Daily snapshot of licenses to monitor usage over time
- Actor(s) that added or removed the license
- Date on which the license addition or removal was performed
- Effective date for when the license additions and removals will affect the monthly bill

### Availability

To find the license history, navigate to **Enterprise > Billing and licensing > Licensing > GitHub Enterprise Cloud > Manage**. This feature is currently available only for metered GitHub Enterprise accounts without Visual Studio bundles.

To learn more, check out our documentation on [viewing usage for your GitHub Enterprise plan](https://docs.github.com/en/billing/how-tos/manage-plan-and-licenses/view-enterprise-usage). If you have feedback about this new feature, join the discussion within [GitHub Community](https://github.com/orgs/community/discussions/categories/announcements).
